description.text: Come back after you've fulfilled the requirements - $(red)Kill 10 pillagers$().
Here, use these to get your first upgrade from the $(green)goddess statues$()! I would recommend talking to some of the guards here if you want to learn some new skills. Good luck on your journey.

rewards.command: /dc addWaypoint @p goblinsanddungeons:ruined_keep "Main Quest - Goblin King's Keep"
